meanings.definition: Resembling a moth in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The small, fluttering wings of the butterfly were mothlike in their delicate appearance.
meanings.sent2: The dim light in the room attracted mothlike insects seeking warmth.
meanings.sent3: The way she kept circling the lamp was so mothlike, it made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her fascination with the flame was almost mothlike, drawn to its flickering dance.
meanings.sent5: The eerie, mothlike figure flitted through the darkness, barely visible.
